name: verse_verse
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool uncovered_treasure.
Tool description: The Uncovered Treasure API has more than 25,000 revealed truths from every Book and chapter in the Bible as recorded by Phil Largent over the last 25 years.
API description: Fetches a biblical verse from the Uncovered Treasure API.

verse.description: Use common English name with chapter number and optionally verse, such as "1 Corinthians 1", "1 Corinthians 1:5" or "James 3". Does NOT support ranged searches, such as "James 3:1-4".

callback.description: An optional JSONP callback function name for the API response. Default is None.
